languages.text: "При изучении разумов технобратьев Авеля, Тарзуса и Деменца я обнаружил аномальное сходство в том, согласно каким паттернам повреждена их память. То, что я считал следствием когнитивных особенностей, синаптических повреждений и искажения мусорным кодом, может быть результатом иного влияния. Фрагменты не поддающихся дешифровке данных в их массивах памяти загадочно... симметричны".

"My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."
languages.original_text: "При изучении разумов технобратьев Авеля, Тарзуса и Деменца я обнаружил аномальное сходство в том, согласно каким паттернам повреждена их память. То, что я считал следствием когнитивных особенностей, синаптических повреждений и искажения мусорным кодом, может быть результатом иного влияния. Фрагменты не поддающихся дешифровке данных в их массивах памяти загадочно... симметричны".

traits.locale_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-brethren Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of junk code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我研究了我的技术伙伴亚伯、塔祖斯和德曼兹的思想。研究结果表明，他们记忆受损的模式异乎寻常地相似。我认为这是由于认知的特异性、突触的损伤，以及另一种废码扭曲造成的结果。他们记忆阵列中的无法解密的数据片段非常神秘……而且左右对称。”
languages.original_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."

traits.locale_text: “我研究了我的技术伙伴亚伯、塔祖斯和德曼兹的思想。研究结果表明，他们记忆受损的模式异乎寻常地相似。我认为这是由于认知的特异性、突触的损伤，以及另一种废码扭曲造成的结果。他们记忆阵列中的无法解密的数据片段非常神秘……而且左右对称。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Al estudiar las mentes de los tecnocamaradas Abel, Tarzus y Dementz he descubierto una similitud anómala en las pautas de los daños sufridos por sus memorias. Lo que atribuía a idiosincrasias cognitivas, a daño sináptico y al efecto deletéreo del código de chatarra podría ser obra de un influjo muy diferente. Los fragmentos indescifrables de datos en sus memorias distribuidas son misteriosamente... simétricos».
languages.original_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."

traits.locale_text: «Al estudiar las mentes de los tecnocamaradas Abel, Tarzus y Dementz he descubierto una similitud anómala en las pautas de los daños sufridos por sus memorias. Lo que atribuía a idiosincrasias cognitivas, a daño sináptico y al efecto deletéreo del código de chatarra podría ser obra de un influjo muy diferente. Los fragmentos indescifrables de datos en sus memorias distribuidas son misteriosamente... simétricos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「技術同胞であるアベル、ターザス、デメンツの精神を調べたところ、彼らの記憶の損傷パターンに異常な類似性があることがわかった。自分はそれを、認知の特異性、シナプスの損傷、破壊コードの歪んだ作用だと考えていたものは、別の種類の影響の結果かもしれない。彼らの記憶アレイにある解読不可能なデータの断片は、不思議なことに…対照的なのだ」
languages.original_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."

traits.locale_text: 「技術同胞であるアベル、ターザス、デメンツの精神を調べたところ、彼らの記憶の損傷パターンに異常な類似性があることがわかった。自分はそれを、認知の特異性、シナプスの損傷、破壊コードの歪んだ作用だと考えていたものは、別の種類の影響の結果かもしれない。彼らの記憶アレイにある解読不可能なデータの断片は、不思議なことに…対照的なのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Studium der Gehirne der Techkameraden Abel, Tarzus und Dementz hat eine anormale Ähnlichkeit in den Schadensmustern gezeigt, die ihr Speicher erlitten hat. Was ich kognitiven Idiosynkrasien, synaptischen Schäden und der verzerrenden Wirkung von Schadcode zugeschrieben habe, kann das Ergebnis einer ganz anderen Art von Einfluss sein. Die nicht zu entziffernden Datenfragmente in ihren Speicherarrays sind auf mysteriöse Weise ... symmetrisch."
languages.original_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Studium der Gehirne der Techkameraden Abel, Tarzus und Dementz hat eine anormale Ähnlichkeit in den Schadensmustern gezeigt, die ihr Speicher erlitten hat. Was ich kognitiven Idiosynkratien, synaptischen Schäden und der verzerrenden Wirkung von Schadcode zugeschrieben habe, kann das Ergebnis einer ganz anderen Art von Einfluss sein. Die nicht zu entziffernden Datenfragmente in ihren Speicherarrays sind auf mysteriöse Weise ... symmetrisch."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « En étudiant les esprits des technoconfrères Abel, Tarzus et Dementz, j'ai découvert une similarité anormale dans les dégâts subis par leur mémoire. Ce que j'ai d'abord pris pour des idiosyncrasies cognitives, des dommages synaptiques et l'effet dénaturant de l'anticode pourrait bien être le résultat d'un autre type d'influence. Les fragments de données indéchiffrables présents dans leur mémoire sont tous étrangement... symétriques. »
languages.original_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."

traits.locale_text: « En étudiant les esprits des technoconfrères Abel, Tarzus et Dementz, j'ai découvert une similarité anormale dans les dégâts subis par leur mémoire. Ce que j'ai d'abord pris pour des idiosyncrasies cognitives, des dommages synaptiques et l'effet dénaturant de l'anticode pourrait bien être le résultat d'un autre type d'influence. Les fragments de données indéchiffrables présents dans leur mémoire sont tous étrangement... symétriques. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."

languages.text: "Tekno yoldaşlarım Abe, Tarzus ve Dementz'in zihinleri üzerindeki çalışmalarım, onların hafızalarında da anormallik olarak nitelenebilecek derecede benzer hasar kalıpları meydana geldiğini ortaya çıkardı. Bilişsel karakter özelliklerine, sinaptik hasara ve hurda kodunun bozucu faaliyetlerine atfettiğim bu hasar kalıplarının asıl sebebi, farklı bir kaynağın tesiri olabilir. Bellek matrislerindeki deşifre edilemeyen veri parçacıkları, gizemli ölçüde simetrik."
languages.original_text: "My study of the minds of the tech-comrades Abel, Tarzus, and Dementz has revealed an anomalous similarity between the patterns of damage their memory sustained. What I attributed to cognitive idiosyncrasies, synaptic damage, and the distortive action of scrap-code may be the result of a different kind of influence. The undecryptable data fragments in their memory arrays are mysteriously... symmetrical."

traits.locale_text: "Tekno yoldaşlarım Abe, Tarzus ve Dementz'in zihinleri üzerine yaptığım çalışmalar, onların hafızalarında da anormallik olarak nitelenebilecek derecede benzer hasar kalıpları meydana geldiğini ortaya çıkardı. Bilişsel karakter özelliklerine, sinaptik hasara ve hurda kodunun bozucu faaliyetlerine atfettiğim bu hasar kalıplarının asıl sebebi, farklı bir kaynağın tesiri olabilir. Bellek matrislerindeki çözülemeyen veri parçacıkları, gizemli ölçüde simetrik."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
